Class FlashCard

java.lang.Object
FlashCard
public class FlashCard
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a flashcard. It contains a question and an answer, and may contain hints, incorrect answers, and tag. A collection of FlashCards is used in a Quiz.
See Also:
Quiz

  • Constructor Details

    • FlashCard

      public FlashCard​(java.lang.String aQuestion, java.lang.String aAnswer, java.lang.String aHint, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> aWrongAnswers, java.util.Set<Tag> aTags)
      The default constructor for the FlashCard class.
      Parameters:
      aQuestion - A String with the question to show on the FlashCard.
      aAnswer - A String with the answer to show on the FlashCard.
      aHint - A String with the hint to show (if requested).
      aWrongAnswers - A List of Strings containing wrong answers. This is to provide alternative answers when creating a Quiz.
      aTags - A List of Tags. These tags are used for sorting FlashCards.
      See Also:
      Tag

    • FlashCard

      public FlashCard​(java.lang.String aQuestion, java.lang.String aAnswer)
      A constructor for the FlashCard class.
      Parameters:
      aQuestion - A String with the question to show on the FlashCard.
      aAnswer - A String with the answer to show on the FlashCard.

      aAnswer - A String with the answer to show on the FlashCard.
      aHint - A String with the hint to show (if requested).
